column1: slight shape away from a good length, he puts in a stride and defends into the off side
back of a length, swinging away from outside off, beats his outside edge on the cut
back of a length outside off stump, skids through and keeps low, but he gets down quickly and opens the face to run it to third man
brings it in from outside off, Tripathi puts in half a stride and drives on the up to find sweeper cover
good length, angled in to the corridor, defended on the up to mid-off
back of a length outside off stump, watches it off the blade as he opens the face to push it to third man
good length, angled across off stump. Onto it quickly and gets the head over the ball before flicking it wide of mid-on
good length at off stump, pushes on the up to mid-off with a straight bat
good length at off stump, defended to point with a half stride
jams it in short, Tripathi is down the pitch to try and slog this, misses out on the hook shot

Bipul throws down the stumps from short fine leg. The comeback men involved in a wicket straight away. Nehra bowled this offcutter at leg stump, just back of a length. Tripathi flicks to Bipul at short fine and he gets it on the bounce nicely. Then sees Tripathi running down the pitch blindly. He knows he can't make it back and prays for the fielder to miss the stumps, no luck
back of a length at leg stump, Smith shuffles across outside off and lets this ball fly past his hips and above the stumps
back of a length at off stump, covers the line and drops this into the leg side with soft hands
full ball at middle stump, he clears the front leg and bunts this to mid-on's right, where Bipul tumbles to his right
slower ball, good length at middle stump, dabs this to short fine's left with soft hands
good length, slower ball angled in at middle stump. rises nicely for him to whip it off his hips to find deep square
back of a length at off stump, tucked across the line to deep square off the back foot
another slower ball, back of a length at off stump, Smith contorts <strike>weirdly</strike> the way he does, and flicks this to deep square

good length, angled into the pads from slightly wide of the crease, and Smith gets good timing on this flick. Rashid is across to his right from deep square and manages to get his body behind it quickly to shield it from the boundary
good length at middle stump, punched on the up to mid-on with the angle

now Bipul puts one down. Good length, angled into the thighs and Smith whips this uppishly towards short fine. Dropped. It's face-height for Bipul who looks flustered as he gets hard hands in front of his face, too early, and lobs it backwards
good length at middle stump, flicked to deep square's left where Rashid is across quickly again to prevent the third
back of a length at middle stump, dabbed to deep square leg
dropped back of a length at middle stump, Smith shapes for a full-blooded pull, mistimes it, straight to deep square
tossed up full at middle stump, leans into it and flicks to deep midwicket
good length at off stump, watches it onto the bat and drops it into the off side with soft hands
googly, good length at off stump, picks it and pushes it to deep midwicket off the front foot
tossed up at off stump, Rahane opens up and drives this to mid-off's left, but not quickly enough to beat Warner's dive
slider, good length at middle stump, pushed off the back foot to midwicket
good length at middle stump, driven on the up to long-on
sees Smith make room, follows him, ends up pushing this a couple of yards down the leg side
back of a length at off stump, rides the bounce and pushes it wide of mid-off with a high elbow

oh you've got to go for the catch Kaul! Warner is livid, he can't believe this. This is a good length ball at middle stump, Rahane chips this feebly to mid-on where the fielder waits for the ball to land in front of him. That should've been a dropped catch at the very least, although it would've been tough to drop
shot! This is glorious. Good length ball at middle stump, he gives him the charge and picks this up from waist height, straight over the long-on boundary. Classy.
back of a length at off stump, tucked to short third man off the back foot
offcutter, good length at off stump, pushes this to deep square with a flick
follows him down the leg side with a full offcutter, it yorks him and he jams it past Smith at the non-strikers, mid-on cleans up
drifted full at leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
good length at middle stump, waits for this slow ball to pitch, gets on one knee, and ramps it fine. Long leg gets across
tossed up at good length outside off, not enough pace on it for Smith who steps down the track and drags this wide of long-on on the bounce

gone. Bipul has persisted with the flight and dip. Really giving nothing to the batsmen. This is good length at middle stump, Rahane is through the sweep early and top-edges to find long leg who ran to his left
good length, drifted in at off stump, driven on the up to long-off
good length at middle stump, keeps low as he goes back, tapped straight to short midwicket
good length at off stump, shuffles across and taps it off the toe of the bat to midwicket. That did not climb.
good length, tailing in at off stump, flicked to deep midwicket
back of a length in the corridor, shuffles across and defends off the back foot to the bowler
back of a length at off stump, walks at it with a view to push into the leg side, drops it into the off side instead and steals the single
short ball outside off stump, shuffles across and pulls it uppishly to deep midwicket
offcutter at a length outside off stump, chopped off the outside half to point
good length, drifted into the pads, clips it too as he looks to flick this. Short fine gets across
good length at middle stump, forward defence into the leg side
back of a length at middle stump, punched off the back foot to long-off
tossed up at a good length, outside off, once more he's down the pitch and can't get to the pitch. He's bowling them really slow. Pushed back to the bowler
back of a length at off stump, musters all his power to pull this wide of long-on

good length at off stump, steps out, not to the pitch, flicks at this hard and offers a slight hope of a diving return catch to the bowler's right. 'Le!' goes Ojha, for 'take', but Bipul wasn't getting to that
back of a length outside off stump, stabbed off the back foot to point
full ball outside off stump, gets behind the line and whips it to deep midwicket's left
good length at off stump, pushed on the up to extra cover
good length at middle stump, pushed to long-on on the up
dropped. Smith is put down again at short fine. This is a full ball at his pads, he flicks it early, Bhuvi can't get his hands around this low to his left
back of a length at middle stump, tapped into the leg side on the up
tossed up at a length outside off, barely to the pitch, check-drives this aerially to long-on
good length at middle stump, uses the front leg to reach it and nails the slog sweep over the deep midwicket boundary

oh shot. Doesn't matter if it's a slow pitch it you're this man. Steps out at this good length ball, barely gets to the pitch but has enough core strength to swivel and supplement his muscular arms. Lifts this over the deep midwicket boundary
back of a length at off stump, pushed into the off side on the up
back of a length at off stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
back of a length at off stump, pulled to deep midwicket's right
googly, back of a length at middle stump, tapped to deep midwicket off the back foot
hammers the reverse sweep, straight to backward point on the bounce. This was pushed through flat at leg stump on a length
another quick one, full at middle stump, bludgeoned down the ground, finds long-on
good length at off stump, leans in and flicks against the turn, gets it wide of long-on
short ball, slider at off stump, finds backward point with the cut
tossed up at off stump, leans in to get to the pitch, drives it to long-on
good length at off stump, steps out and flicks it to short fine's left
back of a length at off stump, punched wide of long-off of the back foot
back of a length outside off stump, hangs deep and slaps it to sweeper cover
too easy for Stokes. Dropped short at off stump, sits up nicely for him and he pulls this over long-on
tossed up at leg stump, gets to the pitch and pushes it wide of deep midwicket with precision, allows him the second
this is flighted at leg stump, he gives him the charge, makes it a full toss and pushes it between deep midwicket and deep square
good length at off stump, drops it square into the off side off the back foot with soft hands
back of a length at leg stump, and once again, he gets the perfect amount of power on his push to make deep midwicket and long-on sprint in hard and despair at giving away the second
there you go, the first four. Back of a length knuckle ball at middle stump, Stokes reverse-swats this over backward point. Yes, reverse-swat to a pacer.
gives him the charge, punches the good length ball off the toe-end to long-on
slower ball, back of a length outside off, gets it into the off side off the under edge as he cuts away from the body
good length, down the leg side, past his flick
low full toss outside off stump, can't time this drive, gets it to long-off with the toe-end
tossed full at leg stump, shoveled off the toes to deep midwicket

he doesn't. Ojha appeals loudly for the caught-behind and it is turned down. Stokes ran past the googly at back of a length. Ojha fumbles the take and can't complete the stumping. But he appeals for the caught behind...and there was a huge edge on that. However, replays show the ball had hit the keeper's grille before he held on to it. So it shouldn't have been out. Not sure that's why the umpire didn't give it though

gets him next ball. This is flat, good length at middle stump, Stokes goes for the old-fashioned slog and completely misses this. He wasn't to the pitch and there was enough of a gap for this to turn in and take leg stump
good length at off stump, on the front foot, pushed into the off side
back of a length at off stump, goes on the back foot and slices it to backward point
back of a length outside off stump, cut to sweeper cover
back of a length at off stump, tailing into him, pushed back down the pitch
back of a length outside off, swings hard with this slog, but it goes past the outside edge
back of a length outside off stump, finds backward point with the cut shot
and that's the end of Smith's misery. Gets an overpitched ball outside off stump, looks to guide this past short third man, but he has offered a straightforward catch to his right
shot. Glorious. Overpitched outside off stump, nice stride into this and drives it with a high elbow past extra cover

and gone next ball. Follows the classy shot with an unceremonious waft across the line. This is back of a length at off stump, he wants to hit over midwicket, can only slice it high for Rashid at long-on
back of a length at off stump, pushes it to third man off the back foot
back of a length at off stump, swivels and pulls this to long-on's right, comes back for a second to loud applause

back of a length at off stump, Dhoni tries to sweep this over square leg who is inside the circle...gets it high on the bat and it lobs gently in front of the fielder...who shies at the non-striker for no apparent reason and gives away the second
slower ball, wide outside off stump, Dhoni lets it go and gets the extra
back of a length, looks to push this into the leg side, gets it on the glove and it doesn't go too far wide of the pitch. He takes off for a single and is sent back as Bhuvi is across quickly to this
back of a length outside off stump, pushed off the back foot to extra cover
lovely placement. This is short and wide outside off stump, he waits for it and very visibly, deliberately, places it past point
googly, skids in quickly as he goes on the back foot for the pull, thick inside edge to short fine
full toss at leg stump, driven to deep midwicket's left
googly, good length outside off stump, leans into it and pushes to deep midwicket
good length at off stump, but the wrist position from the bowler might have made Dhoni expect a googly. He was circumspect and pokes aimlessly as this spun past him to beat him
back of a length at off stump, pushed into the leg side off the back foot
googly, good length at leg stump, gets it into the leg side off his front pad as he looks to flick
yorker outside off stump, Dhoni expands his arms to try and hit this over long-off, no connection, gets it off the toe
dropped short at middle stump, a slight shuffle across and he ramps this over square leg
ah close. This was swinging in from above the wide marker, Dhoni let it go and the umpire deems it wide
shot. Drops it short outside off stump, he's camping on the back foot in anticipation and lifts this pull shot over deep square with ease
misses the yorker outside off, it's overpitched and nicely in the slot for Dhoni. Creams it over sweeper cover
slower ball, back of a length at off stump, squeezes it with an open face to third man

full at off stump, drives it wide of long-off....and goes back for the second. Dhoni doesn't want it. Tiwary might've been looking to give Dhoni the strike next over, but it won't be that way. Both batsmen were stranded at the other end, Bhuvi collects the throw and jams his fingers into the stumps

oh good fieldinfg. This is back of a length at middle stump, he looks to shovel this past short midwicket, where Henriques dives to his right and can't get power on his underarm flick. Would've caught him short with a direct hit
slower ball, angled across off stump, but backward point and third man are in. Dhoni isn't in control of this but he only has to slice it square, and he does it

good catch. This is a length ball at middle stump. That is Dhoni zone, but he closes the face too early and this ball climbs ever so slightly as he slogs across the line. The leading edge flies to Ojha's right and he takes a sharp catch
slower ball, full outside off stump, looks to drive this over long-off, gets it off the toe and picks out Warner there
back of a length at off stump, puts in a lot of effort to try and pull this, but it's too quick for him and he can only bunt it straight to short midwicket
slower ball, good length outside off stump, follows the ball and looks to tickle this past short fine leg, but is beaten. They run the bye

Warner walks at the bowler, this on a length, and swings back in to rap the thigh. Unadkat stumbles after his followthrough, he is clutching his right hamstring. His front foot landed awkwardly. Not good signs for Pune
back of a length and outside off, dabbed to short third man for one
shortish and width outside off, Dhawan flat-bats it away to the left of sweeper cover
crunched, again, this time Rahane is beaten to his left sliding at sweeper cover. Full and width outside off, Dhawan sends it clattering away to the boundary. Sunrisers have already hit a boundary
Unadkat pulls his length back slightly and gets it to nip away outside off, Dhawan sticks his bat out, nearly shaves the outside edge
Another four. Dhawan races down the track, this is shorter and outside off, Dhawan hits it on the up. Flayed over extra cover
slides in with the arm, on leg stump, Warner sits back and works it away to the midwicket region
very full and attacking the stumps, 95ks, defended back to him
back of a length and skids on leg stump, Dhawan hangs back and punches a single to midwicket
speared flat on the leg stump, Warner perhaps made up his mind to get down and sweep even before Sundar delivered it. Swept away to short fine leg
pushed through, bounces past the off stump. Warner attempts a switch-hit but does not make contact
short and fired on middle, Sundar does not give room. So, Warner tries to manufacture some by stepping away outside leg. He only manages to chop the ball to the covers
change-up. Slower cutter, and it just misses the off stump. Warner swings early to leg and is already through with the shot
just short of a good length and outside off, punched square through the off side
short and outside off, 120ks, hip-high ball and attached with a lot of width. Dhawan nails a pull over midwicket. He might send Unadkat a thank-you note later
length ball, on off now, tight line, Dhawan gets forward and pushes a single in the gap at cover
another slower cutter, Warner looks to force it through the covers. He only manages an inside edge that wanders away to square leg
pitched up and outside off, angles in, Dhawan does not meet the pitch and drives. The result is an inside edge onto the thigh
fired flat on middle, nearly 100ks, Warner jabs it down to long-on
this is flat on middle again, 96ks, Dhawan uses his feet and punches a single to long-off
pushed through on off stump, 101ks, Warner attempts a switch-hit. Mis-times it to short third man (for a left-hander)
hint of width, but the length is really full, which means he can only squeeze it to backward point. Tumbling save from Tiwary
slides on off stump, Warner can only push it straight to mid-on
short dart on middle, 104ks, Warner looks to open up the off side by backing away outside leg again. He flays it straight to cover
and he strikes first ball. Offcutter from Stokes, Dhawan presses forward and look to push it through cover. But this keeps extremelylow and sneaks through his defences
full-toss wide outside off, Williamson simply glides it through the vacant slip region for four

and he strikes again, Williamson is gone this time. Good length outside off, shapes away, and bounces at Williamson. He has a short stride and pushes at the ball, plays away from the body. Stokes shaves the outside edge. Dhoni takes it. A quick 39 with the bat and two wickets in his first over. Stokes is turning it around for Pune again
good length and outside off, guided to point
seems like a slower cutter, Yuvraj closes his face early, nearly spoons a return catch
full and width outside off, Yuvraj goes over the top. Crashing it over extra cover
flat on leg stump, Warner goes low and paddles it away square of short fine leg
how did it misses middle stump? Just bounces over it. Good length and slides in, Warner plays down the wrong line and is beaten
pushed through on off, Warner shuffles across off stump and sweeps it over square leg. The fielder has now moved to the deep
Warner backs away outside leg, this is hurled at leg, kept out
slightly short and outside off, gets forward and punches it on the up through the covers
slightly tossed up on middle, Warner has a chance to press forward. He lofts it nice and clean over Sundar's head
full on off, defended back to the bowler
good length and swings away outside off, Yuvraj looks to slog across the line.... and misses
movement and bounce. Good length and swings away outside off, Yuvraj reaches out for the ball with his hands and watches it skirt past the outside edge
just short of a good length and outside off, Yuvraj opens the face and punches it sweetly to sweeper
back of a length on off, Warner jabs it to the left of point for one
full on off, sticks in the surface, Yuvraj is through with the drive already. Fortunately for Yuvraj, the ball did not lob to mid-off
attempted short ball, wrong'un, keeps low on middle, swatted away wide of deep square leg
tossed-up legbreak, this is full and outside off, Warner gets under it and lofts it effortlessly straight down the ground
quicker legbreak, picked off from leg stump through square leg
googly, breaks away outside off, Yuvraj does not pick it. Looks to flick it over midwicket against the turn. The ball does not come on. He chips it to cover
another googly from Tahir, full, Yuvraj gets forward and defends to cover
hip-high short ball on leg stump, hurled at 103ks, Yuvraj swats it away, the ball flies to Sundar's left at square leg. He is a bit late to react and can't cling onto a tough chance
back of a length and angled in on off, played back to the bowler
this was neither too short nor too wide for the cut. Length on off stump, Yuvraj nearly dragged it back onto the stumps
full and very wide outside off, Yuvraj throws the bat at the ball and slashes an outside edge past Dhoni for four
full and just outside off, opens the face and caresses the ball to sweeper cover
short and angled in on leg stump, nearly 140ks, Warner is rushed into his shot. He yanks his bottom hand off the bat and tucks it to deep square
pitched up and outside off, Yuvraj strides forward and drives it on the up. Hits it between mid-off and cover
full on middle and leg, driven to long-on on the front foot
another non-turning ball on the stumps, now it's Yuvraj's turn to press forward and push to long-on
slider outside off, 103ks, Warner opens the face and drives it to the right of extra cover
another quicker one, this keeps low on leg stump, clipped to midwicket
fired down the leg side, wide
googly, much slower through the air, Yuvraj presses forward and defends solidly to the off side
Tahir spears it flat and just outside off, Yuvraj shovels it away to deep midwicket
back of a length and outside off, bounces past Yuvraj's attempted late cut
short and angled in on middle, Yuvraj gets right behind the line and fends it back to the bowler
good length and outside off, Yuvraj looks to mow it over long-on or midwicket. He can't make contact
back of a length on off, opens the face and guides it to point. Stokes, the fielder, has a shy at the non-striker's end though Warner is home. Concedes an extra run
cross-seamer, back of a length and really wide outside off, bounces through to Dhoni as Warner slogs and misses wildly
hip-high short ball on the leg stump, helped to long leg for one
Warner welcomes Christian with a boundary. He walks down the track, takes this full ball from middle and launches it over mid-off
good length and zipping through wide outside off, another cross seamer, Warner swishes and misses
back of a length and straight in line, dropped to midwicket for one
short and outside off, Yuvraj jumps off his feet, rides the bounce, and steers it to deep third man
just short of a good length and outside off, Warner sweetly punches it to sweeper cover
slower cutter outside off, Yuvraj looks to drive early and is beaten by the change up
very very full on middle, backs away a bit and jabs it down to mid-off

Stokes returns and takes down Warner. What a gun player. Banged in short and outside off from around the wicket. Warner jumps off his feet for an upper cut but can't get on top of it. He skies it to Thakur at sweeper
low full-toss outside off, sliced away past backward point
pitched up and outside off, driven through the line to sweeper cover

full and sliding down the leg side, had Yuvraj left it it would have been a wide. He toe-ends it to deep midwicket. Unadkat collects the ball and throws it to Dhoni on the half-volley. He can't collect it cleanly
cross seamer, on a good length and outside off, that's probably a bad length to Yuvraj. He sits deep in the crease and launches it over the bowler's head with s straight bat. Vintage
quicker googly, skids in and raps the front pad, but this was heading down leg
full on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
flat slider on off, backs away and punches a single through cover
pushed through flat on middle, defended
tossed-up legbreak finishes on the pads, whipped to deep square leg
Tahir unleashes the googly. Starts outside off and breaks back in. The length is short. Henriques has no clue about this. He looks to cut and drags it back onto the middle stump
hip-high short ball outside off, swatted away firmly to deep midwicket. Tripathi slides to his right to stop the ball
slower cutter, grips in the surface, really wide outside off. Yuvraj is stapled to the crease as he flashes and misses

short and wide outside off, Yuvraj flashes again, and connects this time. Flayed in the air. The ball swirls away from Thakur, but he stretches his right hand out at sweeper cover and stops what could have been a boundary
full and straight, clipped through midwicket
short of a length and angled in at the chest, slower short ball, fended to leg
full-toss on off, quick one, bunted to short midwicket, Smith flings himself to his left to stop the ball

Tiwary misjudges a skier at short fine leg. This was the front of the hand slider on the leg stump, Yuvraj is cramped for room. He pulls and ends up top-edging it to the right of Tiwary. He was late to run back and across to his right. He stretches his hand right out but the ball balllons over him. Tahir is peeved
tossed up on the pads, picks it up and dispatches it to the midwicket boundary with the wrists
length ball on the stumps, driven down the ground for one
front of the hand slider, rapid pace, defended back
pushed through on off, driven down to long-on
short and breaks away outside off, chopped to backward point
short and wide outside off, Yuvraj flat-bats it on the bounce to the bowler
hip-high short ball on off stump, Yuvraj swivels back and pulls it imperiously. Sends the white ball soaring into the stands behind square leg
short legcutter outside off, Yuvraj reaches out with his hands and flat-bats it down to long-off
full on off stump, Ojha plays early and skews the ball to long-on. That's good enough for a single
crawls through to the keeper. Slower offcutter outside off, fools Yuvraj, but not Dhoni behind the stumps. Good execution from Christian
full and really wide outside off, another slower one at 116ks, asks Yuvraj to reach out and drive to long-off

short and wide - wider than a set of stumps outside off - Unadkat forces Yuvraj to reach out for the ball. He looks to cut it away but is undone by the width. He only slices it in the air. Tripathi judges this skier well. Runs to his right and snaffles it. Yuvraj has some advice for the incoming Bipul
clears Christian at long-on. Full slower ball outside off, Ojha does not time his loft. Ends up skying it over the long-on boundary and tilts it Sunrisers' way
slower ball outside off, pushed into the covers
full and outside off, presses forward and whips it away between deep midwicket and long-on for two
slower short ball outside off, dragged down to long-on

Unadkat strikes with another slower ball, tilting it towards Pune's way. Slower, fuller offcutter wide outside off. Ojha has to reach out, much like Yuvraj did; he looks to loft and ends up slicing it in the air. It's that man Stokes again. He runs in from sweeper cover and tracks it down
wide yorker outside off, Rashid can't run it down to third man. Beaten
pretty full on off stump, swung away to long-on on the bounce
full and really wide outside off, toe-ended in the air, drops in front of deep cover and deep backward point running in
slower full ball outside off, 111ks, flat-batted over the bowler's head. Long-off (Smith) runs across to his left to stop the ball
pretty full and wide, floats a slower ball past the tramline. Off-side wide
pitched up and outside off, drilled through the line to Smith at long-off
slower short ball on middle, 114ks, skies a pull over midwicket. Nine off the over. Stokes finishes with 4-0-30-3
full offcutter outside off, 119ks, the line is wide, Bipul slogs early to the leg side.... and misses

Unadkat and Stokes combine for another wicket. Slower ball, good length on off, Bipul Sharma picks it and swings to leg again. He only skews it off the bottom of the bat. Gets more height as opposed to distance. Holes out to Stokes(who else?) at deep midwicket
Two in two for Unadkat. Another slower ball outside off. Rashid does not pick it. Clears his front leg and toe-ends it in the air. Unadkat himself settles under the skier

four straight dots and a hat-trick in the last over. What a way to reach 100 IPL wickets. Yet another slower ball outside off, this is slightly short. Bhuvneshwar is through with his pull and splices a catch to the right of cover
wide of the crease, another slower ball, which bounces over the stumps, as the batsman plays down the wrong line

what a finish from Unadkat. A hat-trick maiden in the last over. Offcutter outside off, flat-batted to extra cover. There is a mix-up between the wickets, it's eventually a dot. Take a bow, Unadkat. He becomes only the third player after Malinga and Badree to take triple-wicket maidens in the IPL
